name: The Note Competition (Web)
description:
Note: This game is best played when downloaded and may lag or receive errors in the browser. For the best experience, download here!

Join JrTr on his journey to meet new friends through sending notes, battle against rivals in a building competition, and ultimately help repair Gallu's Party Place!

We created this for the Global Game Jam 2020. The entire game and all of its artwork was created in a single weekend by Steve Rakar and Michelle Rakar.

The theme this year was "Repair", so we took that theme and implemented it into the battle system and overall story of the game.
